item.title: Trump, With Tariffs and Threats, Tries to Strong-Arm Nations to Retreat on Climate Goals
item.description: The president has made no secret of his distaste for wind and solar in America. Now he’s taking his fossil fuel agenda overseas.

item.title: Trump’s Push to Fire Lisa Cook Puts Fed Independence on Trial

item.title: FDA Approves Updated Covid Vaccines With New Restrictions

item.title: With Fuzzy Racket Bag, Venus Williams Highlights ERL and Other American Labels
item.description: In her return at the U.S. Open, Ms. Williams decided to highlight labels based in the United States. Her shearling racket bag was hard to miss.
